name: Aurel's Banquet
description:
From the Creator of Insurgence - Chains of Renegade

( Learn more about Insurgence Game here : Insurgence Rpg )

--

Aurel Banquet is 2D RPG with Visual Novel Elements, the Story of Aurelia Levantine and her Sister Kirchis Levantine who want to save her restaurant.

Featuring Original Soundtrack, Original Character Artwork and  Background

--

This game is serve as Prototype, Framework and Foundation for testing new Battle system, Crafting features and some streamlined plugins for lighter load on computer for our second sequel of Insurgence RPG game . We can't promise will develop this game to full version.
